task.title: Create a Collection Using the CollectionMeta Token
task.shortdesc: Create a new Collection by creating a collectionMeta token that is passed to Livefyre.

info.p: The checksum is required if you wish to notify Livefyre of any changes that youâ€™ve made to your Collection. Livefyre will update your Collection only if the checksum provided is different than the previously sent checksum. Creating a checksum is just like creating a collectionMeta token but instead of calling buildCollectionMetaToken you call buildChecksum.
